docs.text: Friendly Pivot Addon Documentation Friendly Pivot Addon mimics the functionality of the Autodesk Maya Pivot Transform tool with minor differences and improvements for the Blender. Its main task is to quickly and conveniently change the Pivot Transform Orientation , Origin and 3D Cursor positions by pressing one key , eliminating the need to select the desired component of a mesh and long travel through different menus to select a necessary action. Just press and hold the button, hover cursor mouse above desire and highlighted component and click LMB or RMB to execute the transform. It’s available on Blender Market Video Intro Features Change Pivot Transform orientation. Change Origin and 3D Cursor positions. Requirements Blender 2.80 or higher. Works in 2.93 alpha\beta. Latest version The latest version of Friendly Pivot Addon is 0.3.1 . Installation Start Blender, then Edit → User Preferences → Add-ons tab, Press 'Install' button and locate the downloaded and unzipped scpo.py file, Activate the addon, save user settings , Close preferences. Quick usage Select object(mesh), press and hold D (invoke key by default, changeable ) and hover mouse cursor above desire mesh component, press LMB to conform Pivot Transform Orientation or RMB to transform Origin to highlighted component. In addition while pressing D key press and hold S key when click LMB to set Origin at the same time and position. Or while pressing D key press and hold C key to set 3D Cursor position when click RMB . Simple. In some cases addon behaves as local orientation and not as native blender normal mode for verts axis. Limitations Works only for meshes now. Known issues The addon in BETA and works well but could be errors. With negative object scale conformed axis flipped and preview loss orientation. If release invoke key while MMB the addon continues to highlight components and preview local axis. Just press invoke key again to stop the issue. If press LMB+RMB it imprints component's conform in viewport. Contact If there is an existed error, please press Report a Bug button in Blender preference Friendly Pivot addon's section.

docs.text: Shortcuts and usage Pivot Gizmo: This visual control gives ability to set Orientation and Origin freely. 'P' button in left bottom corner switches On/Off Pivot gizmo. Main action: Press D + LMB - To set just Transform Orientation. Press D + MMB - Sets only 3D Cursor to highlighted. Press D + RMB - Sets only Origin to highlighted. Additional shortcuts with main action gives some options: Press D + S + LMB or RMB - Sets Orientation and Origin. Press D + C + RMB - Sets 3D Cursor ( this suits if 2 button mouse ). Additional shortcuts while holding D key: Press O - Switch On/Off Pivot to Cursor settings. Press P - Switch On/Off SCPO into Active Transform Tools settings. Multiselection mode: Press D + A + MMB or RMB - Activate multi selection mode for 3D Cursor or Origin. If release A - Set(confirm) Cursor or Origin between selection. If release D - Exit the mode without confirmation. One axel mode: Press D + X or Y or Z + RMB - Set Origin to one axis. Bounding Box mode: Press D + B - Activate Bounding Box mode and widget. Press D + B + MMB or RMB - Sets 3D Cursor or Origin to bbox point. 'L' button in left bottom corner sets bounding box to local\world orientation. !!!Warning!!! - World orientation('W') is heavy calculation with hipoly meshes
